title: SQL Query Processing Using an Integrated FPGA-based Near-Data Accelerator in ReProVide
abstract: In this demo, we explain the working of ReProVide, a framework that integrates an on-the-fly reconfigurable FPGA-based SoC architecture with a DBMS for accelerated query processing. For this, a capability-aware optimization that can optimize and partition the queries is demonstrated. This optimization for the hardware is based on its capabilities. Our hardware can also generate statistics of the data while executing a query. In contrast to the existing approaches, this does not have any additional costs in terms of execution time. We will demonstrate how these statistics are later used by the DBMS to select the best plan from the search space using accurate cost values.
